Campylomma

: 52
(gen. nov.). Type species:

Reuter, 1878
; subsequent designation.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution . European continent (Western, Central, Eastern); Asia: South Korea (GG); China (North, Southeast), Kazakhstan , Iraq , Russia , Turkey , Uzbekistan (
Kerzhner & Josifov 1999
,
Qi et al. 2003
,
Duwal et al. 2013 b
). Host .
Salix
sp., ( Salicaceae ) (
Kerzhner 1988 b
),
Salix babylonica
L. (
Duwal et al. 2013 b
).
